definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: The red flag is flying high in the Chinese Embassy in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐蘇丹大使館，五星紅旗高高飄揚。

sentences.english: Our Five-Starred Red Flag is riffling in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 我們的五星紅旗在微風中飄動。

sentences.english: The Five-Starred Red Flag, I am you am proud.
The sky is blue. I love five-star reg flags. I love China.
sentences.chinese: 天空是藍的，我愛五星紅旗，我愛中國。

sentences.english: The Five-Starred Red Flag flutters the outer space, the world vision focuses China.
sentences.chinese: 五星紅旗飄揚太空，世界目光聚焦中國。

sentences.english: Mom, look at the red flag.
The bright Five-Star Red Flag slowly went up the pole .
sentences.chinese: 鮮豔的五星紅旗徐徐升起。

sentences.english: Every time I see the five-star red flag raising, I always feel blood boil.
sentences.chinese: 每次我看到五星紅旗升起，我總會感到熱血沸騰。

sentences.english: Wang junxia is taking her lap, holding the Five-Star Red Flag.
sentences.chinese: 王軍霞手裏拿着五星紅旗在繞跑道跑。

sentences.english: When you saw the five-star-red-flag rising on Hong Kong's land, what do you think of?
sentences.chinese: 當你看到五星紅旗升騰在香港的土地，做何感想？

sentences.english: The flag of China was raised on the summit of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.chinese: 五星紅旗插上了珠穆朗瑪峯的頂峯。

sentences.english: Seeing five-star red flag rising, the athletes were so ited that they cried.
sentences.chinese: 望着五星紅旗升起，運動員們激動得熱淚盈眶。

sentences.english: When they stand at accept award the on the stage to looking at the fresh and red five planets red flag, rise gradually.
sentences.chinese: 當他們站在領獎臺上看着鮮紅的五星紅旗，冉冉升起。

sentences.english: Now the Chinese five star red flag is slowly rising accompanied by the national anthem.
sentences.chinese: 中國的五星紅旗在國歌聲中緩緩升起。

definition: to offer flowers/to lay flowers (as a memorial)
to be reluctant to give up a post
to stand respectfully/(of trees, mountains) standing tall and majestic
to assist in a candidate's election campaign (Tw)
the (great) Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)/Qing Empire
